```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(flexdashboard)
here::i_am('flexFlashCard.Rmd')
sfiles <- list.files(here('R'), pattern = '.R', recursive = TRUE)
spaths <- file.path(here('R'), sfiles)
sapply(spaths, source)
rm(sfiles, spaths)
```
